product_name: CliniqueMoisture Surge Sheertint Hydrator Broad Spectrum SPF 25 Tinted Moisturizer
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingHSA/FSA eligibleClinique Moisture Surge Sheertint Hydrator SPF 25 is a tinted hydrator that provides 12 hours of hydration, complexion perfection, and protection all in one.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin Types.Coverage: Sheer.Finish: Natural.Sheer tint moisturizer perfects and covers.Powerful hydrating ingredients, including hyaluronic acid and activated aloe water, keep skin plumped and dewy for 12 hours.Sweat- and humidity-resistant formula leaves skin with a fresh, natural finish all day.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Non-acnegenic.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilFragranceItem 2562149How To UseIn AM, apply tinted moisturizer directly to clean skin or over your favorite Clinique moisturizer. A little goes a long way. Squeeze small amount of moisturizer and warm between fingers.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Titanium Dioxide, Zinc Oxide, Caprylyl Methicone, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-10 Pentastearate, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Behenyl Alcohol, PEG-100 Stearate, Sucrose, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract\Extrait D'Orge, Caffeine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Isohexadecane, Lecithin, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Propylene Glycol Dicaprate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seedcake, Trehalose, Isostearic Acid, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Polysorbate 80, Dimethicone, Xanthan Gum, Polyethylene, Acrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Copolymer, Silica, Disodium EDTA, Tetrasodium EDTA, BHT, Phenoxyethanol, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: In AM, apply tinted moisturizer directly to clean skin or over your favorite Clinique moisturizer. A little goes a long way. Squeeze small amount of moisturizer and warm between fingers.

reviews.headline: Wonderful Coverage
reviews.comments: Perfect lightweight tinted moisturizer with sunscreen.  I am pleased with this -- very lightweight -- easy to wear, doesn't feel heavy.  Lightly tinted for some coverage (not full) appreciate the added sunscreen. You can always trust Clinique.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: Color match is awesome sheer but still gives great coverage. Lasts all day and keeps my skin glowing! Gives that clean girl look. Makeup but no makeup look. Doesn't feel tacky or sticky.

reviews.headline: not for me
reviews.comments: didnt like how patchy it was. also felt really oily

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I love this product. The best I have ever used. It feels as if you have nothing on . Was using even better foundations and will never go back .

reviews.headline: Absolutely would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Makes my complexion look so dewy and feels so moisturized all day. Actually makes me look more youthful. I love it. Just was what I was looking for. Great recommendation by Technician,

reviews.headline: Patchy to the limit
reviews.comments: I've tried so many ways to make this less patchy, ensuring proper application and only mixing with water-based skin and cream makeup products. However, this just doesn't work for me and gets immediately patchy. For reference, I have combination skin.

reviews.headline: Not a good shade match
reviews.comments: I fell in between light and light medium.  Light was too light and light medium made my cool skin tone look yellow.  Ive had this problem with Clinique shades in the past.  The moisturizer also tends to roll off my skin.  Found another brand.

reviews.headline: Don't waste your money!
reviews.comments: I really wanted to like this. I tested it with multiple different moisturizers, layering it, not layering it, primer, no primer‚Ä¶.it does not stay on the skin. It pills up and flakes off. If I can manager to get it to stop pilling up it transfers or fades into non existence. Hate it for the price. Much better options available for better price

reviews.headline: Love this!!!
reviews.comments: Best product I have tried for sunblock/moisture/tint. I have wrinkles and this doesnt settle. My face gets very red in the summer. Not from sunburn. I'm just flushed. This product counters it just enough and looks like Im wearing nothing. I get so many compliments on my skin.

reviews.headline: Love It
reviews.comments: This product is amazing. I wear it daily as it is lightweight, just the right amount of coverage, has SPF and perfect for me who works from home and is on camera a lot of the day, but also spends a fair amount of time outside with my animals.

reviews.headline: Too heavy for moisture too oily for coverage.
reviews.comments: It was so hard to find the correct shade. I had to exchange twice. Medium was too dark and light medium was too light. Not sure what its doing, it doesn't have great coverage and just sort of sits on your face so you look extremely oily. Smudges easy. Its a very heavy "Water based" so anything thing that isn't, & is worn under will start to peel/seperate. In my opinion its not worth it, but ANASTASIAS wasnt any better. Continuing to find a better one.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Good coverage but love the feel! Light and airy

reviews.headline: I did not care for thos .
reviews.comments: I didn't feel this product had much moisture.

reviews.headline: Yes, I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: I have always wanted to have a foundation that moisturizes my skin at the same time and frees me from putting on accrual make up. This product does just that. I can look like I have makeup on and not.

reviews.headline: Best coverage
reviews.comments: Perfect coverage. Lightweight and the color is close to perfect.  I use it daily instead of a foundation.

reviews.headline: Most have
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this product. Goes on smooth and lasts. Perfect for my skin

reviews.headline: Perfection
reviews.comments: I just started using rhis product. I work outside some days and spent an entire day outside at a track meet and my face did not burn. It has perfect coverage. I have light to medium tan skin and the medium is a great shade for me.

reviews.headline: I like the light coverage,
reviews.comments: Only problem is it sits on my skin and is not always smooth.

reviews.headline: patchy & dry
reviews.comments: This does not blend well, my skin looks patchy no matter if I use my fingers, brush or beauty sponge. it sticks to dry patches on my skin and starts to peel off. Do not like this at all.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: It is a great moisturizer and gives a nice coverage to all the imperfections

media.headline: Emollient SPF tinted moisture for daytime casual
media.caption: Weekend makeup üíÑ

media.headline: Not much coverage
media.caption: Wearing on my left side only

faceoff_positive.comments: I was really nervous to test out this tinted moisturizer after reading several reviews. I saw that a lot of the reviews said they had peeling issues. That made me think that the tinted moisturizer wasn't mixing well with something else they were using on their face and determined that if you do not put moisturizer on before using this tinted moisturizer you will not have that peeling problem. I usually will put on a moisturizer before putting on any liquid foundation, And I bet a lot of people also put on moisturizer before using a tinted moisturizer or liquid foundation but this seems a little counterproductive because you're going to moisturize your skin with the tinted moisturizer... But I have had no issues with the moisturizer peeling or looking strange at all. I also found it to be moisturizing. I use majority of the time a light liquid tinted moisturizer from other brands and really wanted to try out Clinique's and have been very pleased with it. So if you are having problems with it acting strange after putting it on try not wearing any moisturizer underneath this product I have a feeling you might be having an interaction with the original moisturizer and the moisturizer in this product. Hope that helps someone out. I think the color blends well as at first I thought it might be a little dark for me but once I applied it and blended it out it really just melted in my skin. I've used it several times now before posting this review. Will update if I have any issues. I did buy my product online.
faceoff_positive.headline: Do not use lotion underneath.

faceoff_negative.comments:
**Before I give my review, I must disclose that I put this on and immediately had to take it off because my face got irritated and broke out into a rash/allergic reaction, which is unusual for me with ANY Clinique products.**

Review: This small tube of cream was incredibly thick and had a very strong chemical sunscreen smell. It clung to every single dry patch on my face, so the things I was trying to help camouflage by using it, it just made look worse.  It definitely didn't feel like a sheer coverage.  It also was super difficult to remove, requiring a double cleanse of take the day off balm, then follow up with my foaming cream cleanser to completely take it off. For some people, it may be fantastic! I just seem to not be one of those people.

Thankfully, customer service helped me sort things out when I reported my allergic reaction!
faceoff_negative.headline: Just didn't work for my dry combination sensitive skin!

rollup.name: Moisture Surge Sheertint Hydrator Broad Spectrum SPF 25 Tinted Moisturizer
